content: i designed this jumper to suit the seasonal subscription boxes i receive from lauren aston designs the wool is fabulous and i am totally addicted this jumper is a true to size fit designed to have approximately 5cm positive ease mine is a waist length fit however feel free to make it as long or as short as you wish please bare in mine adding length will require more wool sizes s m l bust measurement 90cm 100cm 110cm nb i made a size small and measure a 90cm bust small = 450g 270m medium = 550g 330m large = 700g 420m please note this pattern has only been tested in a small and other sizes are an estimate
